title: Job Tracker Web Application
description: This web application helps job seekers organize their job search process. Users can track application statuses and store interview notes. Developed using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Firebase.

title: Interactive Public Health Dashboard
description: Developed for a research project, this dashboard visualizes health data interactively. Built using Python, Plotly, and Dash, it provides statistical insights and trends through interactive charts and graphs.

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: This website showcases my projects, resume, and contact information. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it's designed to provide an easy overview of my work for collaborators and employers.

title: Machine Learning Projects
description: These projects include a sentiment analysis model and supervised learning algorithms for classification tasks. Developed using Python, TensorFlow, and Scikit-learn.
